name: Resistance
display_help: Auto Res Lethal Disorient

name: Ground_Smash
display_help: All foes that pass through this Earthquake will be debuffed and may fall down.

name: Resistance
display_help: Eochai resistance.

name: Sweeping_Blow
display_help: This is a tremendous sweeping blow with your club. It will send most foes flying and crush many enemies. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Overhead_Smash
display_help: This is a massive overhead smash with your club. It will knock the target to the ground. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

name: Noxious_Odor
display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Skull_Stare
display_help: The stare of the skull has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

name: Dry_Heave
display_help: Jack's Skull Heave has weakened you and reduced your damage.

name: Howling_Skull
display_help: A short range, but powerful sonic attack. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: Auto Res Lethal Disorient

name: Transformation
display_help: Some 5th Column Bosses can transform into Nightwolves.

name: Metamorphosis
display_help: This power is simply the visual fx for a transformed Redcap

name: Resistance
display_help: Auto Res Lethal Disorient

name: Transformation
display_help: Some 5th Column Lieutenants can transform into Nightwolves.

name: Gnome_Toss
display_help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to Accuracy. Recharge: Slow

name: Stab
display_help: Wavy ritual blade.

name: Jump_Stab
display_help: This wavey sword attack does medium damage and can reduce your foes defense.

name: Lunge
display_help: This small curved short sword has been enchanted to channel negative energy damage to its victims.

name: Jump_Stab
display_help: This wavey sword attack does medium damage and can reduce your foes defense.

name: Lunge

name: Jump_Stab
display_help: This wavey sword attack does medium damage and can reduce your foes defense.

name: Fistful_of_Arrows
display_help: You fire a fistful of arrows at foes in a cone in front of you. Good at close range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Quick Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Snap_Shot
display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Transformation
display_help: Snaptooth can transform into a Lt.
